#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

double areaCalc(vector<int>& X, vector<int>& Y, int pointsCount)
{
    double area = 0;
    int i, j = pointsCount - 1;
	for(i=0; i < pointsCount; i++)
	{
		area+=(X[j]+X[i])*(Y[j]-Y[i]);
		j = i;
	}
    return abs(area/2);
}
int main()
{
    cin.tie(NULL);
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    vector<int> X;
    vector<int> Y;
    int T, N, u;
    cin >> T;
    while(T != 0)
    {
        cin >> N;
        for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)
        {
            cin >> u;
            X.push_back(u);
        }
        for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)
        {
            cin >> u;
            Y.push_back(u);
        }

        cout.precision(1);
        cout.setf(ios::fixed, ios::floatfield );
        cout << areaCalc(X, Y, N) <<"\n";
        X.clear();
        Y.clear();
        T--;
    }
    return 0;
}
